name: Package Planet
description:
Buy and deliver packages to the many shops around the centre island to get enough money for an air filter and save the town from the toxic gas!

Use Zip-lines and low gravity to get around!

Assets used from: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/polygon-sci-fi-city-pack-115950
Animations from Mixamo
Sounds:

https://freesound.org/people/Filo_Rossi/sounds/342136/

https://freesound.org/people/NTTB/sounds/348215/
https://freesound.org/people/kiddpark/sounds/201159/
